participant_1.background:
I design video games for a living.
My wife recently got laid off from her human resources job.
I am trying to create my own startup company in the gaming industry.
My son plays on the local football team.

participant_2.background:
My dad is a veteran.
I listen to all kinds of music.
My favorite color is green.
I like to play tennis.
I love watching funny movies.

content.text: Hello! How are you today?
Hello! I am doing well, thanks for asking. How are you doing?
I am doing great, thanks! I am a video game designer and I am trying to create my own startup company in the gaming industry.
That sounds like a very exciting project! I hope it goes well for you.
Thanks! I'm putting a lot of hard work into it and I'm hoping it will pay off.
It sounds like you're doing everything right. I'm sure it will be a success.
I hope so!
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to play video games, watch movies, and go out with friends.
I like to do all those things too! What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like to watch all kinds of movies, but I especially like funny movies and action movies.
Me too! I love watching funny movies to make me laugh.
What's your favorite funny movie?
I love The Hangover. It's so funny!
I love that movie too! It's one of my favorites.
So, what kind of music do you like to listen to?
I listen to all kinds of music, but I especially like rock music.
Me too! I love rock music. What's your favorite rock band?
I love Led Zeppelin. They're my favorite band of all time.
Me too! They're so good!
